headers.value: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.puter.com wss://*.puter.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.puter.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: blob:; frame-src 'self' https://*.puter.com; child-src 'self' https://*.puter.com
